```vue
<template>
    <ui-container>
        <pre>{{ prop }}</pre>
        <ui-draggable-accordion v-model="prop">
            <template #header="{ item }">{{ item }}</template>
            <template #default="{ item }">{{ item }}</template>
        </ui-draggable-accordion>
        <pre>{{ prop2 }}</pre>
        <ui-draggable-accordion v-model="prop2" v-bind="bind2">
            <template #header="{ item }">{{ item }}</template>
            <template #default="{ item }">{{ item }}</template>
        </ui-draggable-accordion>
        <pre>{{ prop3 }}</pre>
        <ui-draggable-accordion v-model="prop3" v-bind="bind3">
            <template #header="{ item }">{{ item }}</template>
            <template #default="{ item }">{{ item }}</template>
        </ui-draggable-accordion>
    </ui-container>
</template>
<script>
import ui from './index.js';

export default {
    components: { ...ui },
    data: (vm) => ({
        prop: ['data1', 'data2'],
        prop2: ['data1', 'data2'],
        prop3: ['data1', 'data2'],
        bind2: {
            toolboxControls: []
        },
        bind3: {
            toolboxControls: [{ icon: 'mdi-minus-box-outline', label: 'Удалить', handler: vm.remove }]
        }
    }),
    methods: {
        remove(index) {
            this.prop3.splice(index, 1);
        }
    }
};
</script>
```
